en: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth;
that is what you were trying to avoid.
And the Horn will be blown.
And the Horn will be blown.
That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.
And every soul will come, with it
with it a driver and a witness.

ar: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَذَا
en: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this,
and We have removed from you your cover,
so your sight, this Day, is sharp."
